org.apache.giraph.metrics

类 ValueGauge<T extends Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yammer.metrics.core.Gauge<T>
      • org.apache.giraph.metrics.ValueGauge<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - type of value being held.
    所有已实现的接口:
    com.yammer.metrics.core.Metric
    直接已知子类:
    GiraphTimer

    public class ValueGauge<T extends Number>
extends com.yammer.metrics.core.Gauge<T>
    A Gauge that holds a value.
